title: Enhancing Service Quality Practical Competencies: A Sociotechnical Approach to Improving Usability of Mobile-Based CMS

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mobile device usage experience and internet proficiency
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can independently upload/edit work documents by navigating basic CMS functions in mobile environments.
Learners can evaluate CMS interface design elements (content layout, navigation structure) from a sociotechnical perspective.
Learners can derive content structuring strategies for CMS to improve user experience through team project execution.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
